description:
Introductions to Learning Puppetry will give you a basic knowledge and understanding of how to be a Puppeteer and will set a foundation in your training and works in Puppeteering.

Some topics we will cover in the course include ;

  • How to operate a Puppet
  • How to build a Basic Puppet
  • Working a Puppet as an ensemble
  • Puppets, Props and Sets
  • Children's Theatre Puppets
  • And Much More!
title: How To Puppeteer
